PaymentRequestEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The PaymentRequestEvent interface of the {{domxref("Payment Handler API", "", "", "nocode")}} is the object passed to a payment handler when a is made.

remarks.para:
-Web-based payment apps overview
-Setting up a payment method
-Life of a payment transaction
-Using the Payment Request API
-Payment processing concepts

PaymentRequestEventChangePaymentMethod.summary: NOTE Experimental The changePaymentMethod() method of the interface is used by the payment handler to get an updated total, given such payment method details as the billing address.

remarks.para: When this method is invoked, a is fired.

-Web-based payment apps overview
-Setting up a payment method
-Life of a payment transaction
-Using the Payment Request API
-Payment processing concepts

PaymentRequestEventChangePaymentMethod.returns: A that resolves with a PaymentRequestDetailsUpdate object. This object contains the following properties:

PaymentRequestEventMethodData.summary:
NOTE Experimental The methodData read-only property of the
interface returns an array of
PaymentMethodData objects containing payment method identifiers for the
payment methods that the website accepts and any associated payment method-specific
data.

remarks.para:
-Web-based payment apps overview
-Setting up a payment method
-Life of a payment transaction
-Using the Payment Request API
-Payment processing concepts

PaymentRequestEventMethodData.value: An array of PaymentMethodData objects. Each object contains the following properties:

PaymentRequestEventModifiers.summary:
NOTE Experimental The modifiers read-only property of the
interface returns an {{jsxref("Array")}} of PaymentDetailsModifier objects containing modifiers for payment details.

remarks.para:
-Web-based payment apps overview
-Setting up a payment method
-Life of a payment transaction
-Using the Payment Request API
-Payment processing concepts

PaymentRequestEventModifiers.value: An array of objects containing modifiers for payment details. These objects contain the following properties:

PaymentRequestEventOpenWindow.summary: NOTE Experimental The openWindow() method of the interface opens the specified URL in a new window, only if the given URL is on the same origin as the calling page. It returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with a reference to a .

remarks.para:
-Web-based payment apps overview
-Setting up a payment method
-Life of a payment transaction
-Using the Payment Request API
-Payment processing concepts

PaymentRequestEventOpenWindow.returns:
A that resolves with a reference to a
.

PaymentRequestEventPaymentRequestEvent.summary: NOTE Experimental The PaymentRequestEvent constructor creates a new object instance.

remarks.para:
-Web-based payment apps overview
-Setting up a payment method
-Life of a payment transaction
-Using the Payment Request API
-Payment processing concepts

PaymentRequestEventPaymentRequestId.summary:
NOTE Experimental The paymentRequestId read-only property of the
interface returns the ID of the
object.

remarks.para:
-Web-based payment apps overview
-Setting up a payment method
-Life of a payment transaction
-Using the Payment Request API
-Payment processing concepts

PaymentRequestEventPaymentRequestOrigin.summary:
NOTE Experimental The paymentRequestOrigin read-only property of the
interface returns the origin where the
object was initialized.

remarks.para:
-Web-based payment apps overview
-Setting up a payment method
-Life of a payment transaction
-Using the Payment Request API
-Payment processing concepts

PaymentRequestEventRespondWith.summary: NOTE Experimental The respondWith() method of the interface prevents the default event handling and allows you to provide a {{jsxref("Promise")}} for a payment handler response object yourself.

remarks.para:
-Web-based payment apps overview
-Setting up a payment method
-Life of a payment transaction
-Using the Payment Request API
-Payment processing concepts

PaymentRequestEventTopOrigin.summary:
NOTE Experimental The topOrigin read-only property of the
interface returns the top-level payee origin where
the object was initialized.

remarks.para:
-Web-based payment apps overview
-Setting up a payment method
-Life of a payment transaction
-Using the Payment Request API
-Payment processing concepts

PaymentRequestEventTotal.summary:
NOTE Experimental The total read-only property of the interface returns a
PaymentCurrencyAmount object containing the total amount being requested for payment.

remarks.para:
-Web-based payment apps overview
-Setting up a payment method
-Life of a payment transaction
-Using the Payment Request API
-Payment processing concepts

PaymentRequestEventTotal.value: A PaymentCurrencyAmount object. This object contains the following properties:
